question.text:
Select the correct statement/s with respect to mechanism of sex determination in Grasshopper.
(A) It is an example of female heterogamety.
(B) Male produces two different types of gametes either with or without $\mathrm{X}$ chromosome.
(C) Total number of chromosomes (autosomes and sex chromosomes) is same in both males and females.
(D) All eggs bear an additional $\mathrm{X}$ chromosome besides the autosomes.
Choose the correct answer from the options given below :

solution.text:
Grasshopper shows male heterogamety and chromosomal constituent of male is AA + XO and female is $A A+X X$
Males have lesser number of sex chromosomes as compared to females.
Male produce two types of gametes $(\mathrm{A}+\mathrm{X})$ and $(\mathrm{A}+\mathrm{O})$
